title: BUA in lieu of cost of construction of IH shall be allowed as specified in Regulation No
clause_text: BUA in lieu of cost of construction of IH shall be allowed as specified in Regulation No.30, table 12 or can be adjusted against permissible TDR/Additional FSI on payment of premium.
